publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1058 Margaret Jamieson: Securing of Additional Benefits by East Ayrshire Council—That the Parliament congratulates East Ayrshire Council on obtaining £2.6 million of additional benefits for its citizens during 1999-2000 and on its total of £9.8 million of additional benefits achieved since its inception in 1996 and supports East Ayrshire Council and other councils in Scotland in their efforts to ensure social inclusion through the maximisation of take-up of benefits. Supported by: Cathy Jamieson*

S1M-1058 Margaret Jamieson: Securing of Additional Benefits by East Ayrshire Council—That the Parliament congratulates East Ayrshire Council on obtaining £2.6 million of additional benefits for its citizens during 1999-2000 and on its total of £9.8 million of additional benefits achieved since its inception in 1996 and supports East Ayrshire Council and other councils in Scotland in their efforts to ensure social inclusion through the maximisation of take-up of benefits. Supported by: Cathy Jamieson
S1M-1058 Securing of Additional Benefits by East Ayrshire Council (lodged on 27 June 2000) Malcolm Chisholm*

Supported by: Cathy Jamieson, Malcolm Chisholm, Scott Barrie*
